name: history
description: the updated conversation history including all relevant previous turns and the latest user message

name: domain
description: specific type or domain of text data the model will handle (e.g., reviews, emails, financial reports)

class_definitions.not_provided: user has not indicated whether they will provide their own data

name: user_wants_to_provide_its_own_data
description: true if the user indicates they will provide their own data

class_definitions.not_provided: user has not indicated whether they will provide their own data
class_definitions.provide_its_own_data: user will provide their own data
class_definitions.does_not_provide_its_own_data: user will not provide their own data

name: assistant_response
description: the assistant’s next message — either a follow-up question or a confirmation summary phrased naturally

name: user_approved
description: true if the user confirmed or agreed with the assistant’s summary

class_definitions.approved: user provided all information, and approved the assistant's summary
class_definitions.not_approved: user did not confirm the assistant's summary
